solution_line_template: First find the cost of two slices of bread: ${bread_cost_per_slice}/slice * {bread_slices} slices = $<<{bread_cost_per_slice}*{bread_slices}={bread_total_cost}>>{bread_total_cost}

Then add the cost of one slice each of ham and cheese: ${bread_total_cost} + ${ham_cost_per_slice} + ${cheese_cost_per_slice} = $<<{bread_total_cost}+{ham_cost_per_slice}+{cheese_cost_per_slice}={sandwich_total_cost}>>{sandwich_total_cost}
